Eurovia France division

Robert Bello, born in 1965, holds an engineering degree from the École des Mines d’Alès. He began his career with Eurovia in 1988 as a works engineer in Seine Saint Denis and then sector manager. From 1993, he held various division manager posts in the greater Paris area, before being appointed Regional Director of Languedoc Roussillon in 2005 and then Île de France in 2011. He was appointed Delegate Manager of Eurovia in charge of Île de France and Normandy in 2014. Robert Bello joined Eurovia’s Executive Committeee on 1 January 2020 as Chief Executive Officer for France.

As of February 2021, Robert Bello heads the Eurovia France division within the VINCI Construction pole.
